title: Google\Cloud\AppEngine\V1\ManualScaling
name: ManualScaling
description:
A service with manual scaling runs continuously, allowing you to perform complex initialization and rely on the state of its memory over time.

Generated from protobuf message google.appengine.v1.ManualScaling

params.name: data.instances
params.description: Number of instances to assign to the service at the start. This number can later be altered by using the Modules API set_num_instances() function.
